SEARCH
Package game.characters

Class Cat

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
game.characters.Cat
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.StepListener, EventListener
public class Cat extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody implements city.cs.engine.StepListener
Main player character (the Cat) that the player controls. Handles movement, combat, animations, pickups, and special abilities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new Cat character in the given world.
